name: Crunch Time (Micha Faw)
description:
From the MeatlyJam, it's Crunch Time! A top-down, single screen action game where you experience the life of a gamedev by finding the time to keep the real world at bay and your projects alive. Beware the Idea Fairy or you may end up with more projects than you can handle at one time. Don't find enough time and you'll feel the crunch!

Arrows to move.
